attributes.action: More help with ivf for same sex couples
attributes.additional_details: Times have changed same sex couples should be aloud help on the nhs to become pregnant and not have to spend thousands making the thaught of a family out of reach
attributes.background: There isn't enough help out there for us same sex couples a hetro sexual couple if infertile can have ivf on the NHS now this is amazing I really think it is ... but what about is same sex couples.we have every right to be able to become perants and a family there needs to be more help avalaible

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you're concerned about the availability of IVF for same sex couples, but we're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
